segments.text: Holly ? Holly Madison , is that you ? You look great ! You haven't changed a bit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh ... Andrew . Hello . I can't quite remember you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's me . The D-man ! I sat behind you in English . Are you and Taylor still dating ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um ... we never were . We're just friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you're not seeing anyone , maybe we could ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ... I am seeing someone . This is Yi-jun , my ...
segments.speaker: S2
